insert into tworkorder (nomorwo, tvendorservice_fk, adhoc, origintlocation_fk, destinationtlocation_fk, tservicemode_fk, torder_fk, tservicetype_fk, tvendor_fk, maxlevel, totalweight, totalvolume, tdeliveryterm_fk, charge, tcurrency_fk, agreementdate, agreementno, pph, ppn, executiondate, editcounter, revisioncounter, lasttlevel, nexttlevel, createddate, createdbyemployeeid, wostatus, approvalreason, cancelreason, editreason, isgranted, revisionreason, revisionreasoneksternal, deliverynote, gooddescription, validationnote, cancellationfee, cancellationtcurrencyfk) values (#nomorwo:CHAR#, #tvendorserviceFk:LONG#, #adhoc:BIT#, #origintlocationFk:LONG#, #destinationtlocationFk:LONG#, #tservicemodeFk:LONG#, #torderFk:LONG#, #tservicetypeFk:LONG#, #tvendorFk:LONG#, #maxlevel:INTEGER#, #totalweight:DECIMAL#, #totalvolume:DECIMAL#, #tdeliverytermFk:LONG#, #charge:DECIMAL#, #tcurrencyFk:LONG#, #agreementdate:DATE#, #agreementno:VARCHAR#, #pph:DECIMAL#, #ppn:DECIMAL#, #executiondate:DATE#, #editcounter:INTEGER#, #revisioncounter:INTEGER#, #lasttlevel:INTEGER#, #nexttlevel:INTEGER#, #createddate:TIMESTAMP#, #createdbyemployeeid:VARCHAR#, #wostatus:VARCHAR#, #approvalreason:VARCHAR#, #cancelreason:VARCHAR#, #editreason:VARCHAR#, #isgranted:BIT#, #revisionreason:VARCHAR#, #revisionreasoneksternal:VARCHAR#, #deliverynote:LONGVARCHAR#, #gooddescription:LONGVARCHAR#, #validationnote:LONGVARCHAR#, #cancellationfee:DECIMAL#,#cancellationtcurrencyfk:LONG#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

tworkorder_da.tworkorder_fk as tworkorder_da_tworkorder_fk,tworkorder_da.is_pod as is_da_pod, tworkorder_manifest.manifest_no, tworkorder_manifest.tworkorder_fk as tworkorder_manifest_tworkorder_fk, tworkorder_smodedetail.quantity, tworkorder_smodedetail.tservicemodedetail_fk, tworkorder_smodedetail.smdcharge, tworkorder_smodedetail.smdremarks, tworkorder_smodedetail.smddetailname,tworkorder_smodedetail.smdtcurrency_fk, tworkorder_smodedetail.deleted, tservicemodedetail.smdcode, tservicemodedetail.smdname, tservicemodedetail.tservicemodedetail_pk, tcurrency.*, tdeliveryterm.*, tlevel.*, atcurrency.tcurrency_pk as wosmd_tcurrency_pk, atcurrency.currencycode as wosmd_currencycode, atcurrency.currencyname as wosmd_currencyname, torder.*, tservicetype.*, atuser.employee_id as atuser_employee_id, atuser.first_name as atuser_first_name, atuser.middle_name as atuser_middle_name, atuser.last_name as atuser_last_name, atuser.grantfrom as atuser_grantfrom, atuser.grantto as atuser_grantto, atuser.bossemployeeid as atuser_bossemployeeid, atuser.email as atuser_email, atuser.area_id as atuser_area_id, atuser.division_id as atuser_division_id, atuser.department_id as atuser_department_id, atuser.station_id as atuser_station_id, atuser.job_title_id as atuser_job_title_id, atuser.level_id as atuser_level_id, atuser.isactiveuser as atuser_isactiveuser

from tworkorder atworkorder left outer join tvendor on atworkorder.tvendor_fk=tvendor.tvendor_pk left outer join tlocation originlocation on atworkorder.origintlocation_fk=originlocation.tlocation_pk left outer join tlocation destinationlocation on atworkorder.destinationtlocation_fk=destinationlocation.tlocation_pk left outer join tcurrency on atworkorder.tcurrency_fk=tcurrency.tcurrency_pk left outer join tuser atuser on atworkorder.createdbyemployeeid=atuser.employee_id left outer join tworkorder_da on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorder_da.tworkorder_fk left outer join tworkorder_manifest on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorder_manifest.tworkorder_fk left outer join tworkorder_smodedetail on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorder_smodedetail.tworkorder_fk left outer join tservicemodedetail on tworkorder_smodedetail.tservicemodedetail_fk=tservicemodedetail.tservicemodedetail_pk left outer join tdeliveryterm on atworkorder.tdeliveryterm_fk=tdeliveryterm.tdeliveryterm_pk left outer join tlevel on atworkorder.maxlevel = tlevel.level_value left outer join tcurrency atcurrency on tworkorder_smodedetail.smdtcurrency_fk=atcurrency.tcurrency_pk left outer join torder on atworkorder.torder_fk=torder.torder_pk left outer join tservicetype on atworkorder.tservicetype_fk=tservicetype.tservicetype_pk

select atworkorder.tworkorder_pk as atworkorder_tworkorder_pk, atworkorder.nomorwo as atworkorder_nomorwo, atworkorder.tvendorservice_fk as atworkorder_tvendorservice_fk, atworkorder.adhoc as atworkorder_adhoc, atworkorder.origintlocation_fk as atworkorder_origintlocation_fk, atworkorder.destinationtlocation_fk as atworkorder_destinationtlocation_fk, atworkorder.tservicemode_fk as atworkorder_tservicemode_fk, atworkorder.torder_fk as atworkorder_torder_fk, atworkorder.tservicetype_fk as atworkorder_tservicetype_fk, atworkorder.tvendor_fk as atworkorder_tvendor_fk, atworkorder.maxlevel as atworkorder_maxlevel, atworkorder.totalweight as atworkorder_totalweight, atworkorder.totalvolume as atworkorder_totalvolume, atworkorder.tdeliveryterm_fk as atworkorder_tdeliveryterm_fk, atworkorder.charge as atworkorder_charge, atworkorder.tcurrency_fk as atworkorder_tcurrency_fk, atworkorder.agreementdate as atworkorder_agreementdate, atworkorder.agreementno as atworkorder_agreementno, atworkorder.pph as atworkorder_pph, atworkorder.ppn as atworkorder_ppn, atworkorder.executiondate as atworkorder_executiondate, atworkorder.editcounter as atworkorder_editcounter, atworkorder.revisioncounter as atworkorder_revisioncounter, atworkorder.lasttlevel as atworkorder_lasttlevel, atworkorder.nexttlevel as atworkorder_nexttlevel, atworkorder.createddate as atworkorder_createddate, atworkorder.createdbyemployeeid as atworkorder_createdbyemployeeid, atworkorder.wostatus as atworkorder_wostatus, atworkorder.approvalreason as atworkorder_approvalreason, atworkorder.cancelreason as atworkorder_cancelreason, atworkorder.cancellationfee as atworkorder_cancellationfee, atworkorder.cancellationtcurrencyfk as atworkorder_cancellationtcurrencyfk, atworkorder.editreason as atworkorder_editreason, atworkorder.deliverynote as atworkorder_deliverynote, atworkorder.gooddescription as atworkorder_gooddescription, atworkorder.isgranted as atworkorder_isgranted, atworkorder.revisionreason as atworkorder_revisionreason, atworkorder.validationnote as atworkorder_validationnote, atworkorder.revisionreasoneksternal as atworkorder_revisionreasoneksternal, tvendor.*, originlocation.locationname as orilocationname, originlocation.locationcode as orilocationcode, destinationlocation.locationname as destlocationname, destinationlocation.locationcode as destlocationcode, tcurrency.*, tdeliveryterm.*, tlevel.*, torder.*, tservicetype.*
from tworkorder atworkorder left outer join tvendor on atworkorder.tvendor_fk=tvendor.tvendor_pk left outer join tlocation originlocation on atworkorder.origintlocation_fk=originlocation.tlocation_pk left outer join tlocation destinationlocation on atworkorder.destinationtlocation_fk=destinationlocation.tlocation_pk left outer join tcurrency on atworkorder.tcurrency_fk=tcurrency.tcurrency_pk left outer join tdeliveryterm on atworkorder.tdeliveryterm_fk=tdeliveryterm.tdeliveryterm_pk left outer join tlevel on atworkorder.maxlevel = tlevel.level_value left outer join torder on atworkorder.torder_fk=torder.torder_pk left outer join tservicetype on atworkorder.tservicetype_fk=tservicetype.tservicetype_pk

,tworkorderflow.actiondate as approveddate
left outer join tworkorderflow on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorderflow.tworkorder_fk
sqlMap.select:
select count(distinct atworkorder.tworkorder_pk)
order by $orderByClause$
limit $limitClause$

select distinct tworkorder_fk from tworkorderflow inner join tworkorder on tworkorder_fk=tworkorder_pk where tworkorderflow.employeeid=#employeeid# and nomorwo like #nomorwo#
limit $limitClause$
SELECT count(DISTINCT tworkorder_fk) FROM tworkorderflow INNER JOIN tworkorder ON tworkorder_fk = tworkorder_pk where tworkorderflow.employeeid=#employeeid# and nomorwo like #nomorwo#

where atworkorder.wostatus != #wostatus# and tworkorder_pk in (select distinct tworkorder_fk from tworkorderflow where tworkorderflow.employeeid=#employeeid# and tworkorderflow.oldwostatus=#oldwostatus#)
order by $orderByClause$
limit $limitClause$

select count(tworkorder_pk) from tworkorder where tworkorder.wostatus != #wostatus# and tworkorder_pk in (select distinct tworkorder_fk from tworkorderflow where tworkorderflow.employeeid=#employeeid# and tworkorderflow.oldwostatus=#oldwostatus#)

select count(tworkorder_pk) from tworkorder where tworkorder_pk in (select atworkorder.tworkorder_pk from tworkorder atworkorder left outer join tvendor on atworkorder.tvendor_fk=tvendor.tvendor_pk left outer join tworkorder_da on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorder_da.tworkorder_fk left outer join tworkorder_manifest on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorder_manifest.tworkorder_fk left outer join tworkorder_smodedetail on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorder_smodedetail.tworkorder_fk left outer join tworkorderflow on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorderflow.tworkorder_fk
)

SELECT DISTINCT a.tworkorder_pk as wopk, a.nomorwo as wo, b.da as da, c.manifest_no as man, a.wostatus as status FROM tworkorder a LEFT JOIN tworkorder_da b ON b.tworkorder_fk = a.tworkorder_pk LEFT JOIN tworkorder_manifest c ON c.tworkorder_fk = a.tworkorder_pk WHERE a.nomorwo IN
#[]#
ORDER BY a.tworkorder_pk ASC

SELECT DISTINCT b.tworkorder_pk AS wopk, b.nomorwo AS wo, a.da AS da, c.manifest_no AS man, b.wostatus AS STATUS FROM tworkorder_da a LEFT JOIN tworkorder b ON a.tworkorder_fk = b.tworkorder_pk LEFT JOIN tworkorder_manifest c ON c.tworkorder_fk = b.tworkorder_pk WHERE a.da IN
#[]#
ORDER BY b.tworkorder_pk ASC

SELECT DISTINCT b.tworkorder_pk AS wopk, b.nomorwo AS wo, c.da AS da, a.manifest_no AS man, b.wostatus AS STATUS FROM tworkorder_manifest a LEFT JOIN tworkorder b ON a.tworkorder_fk = b.tworkorder_pk LEFT JOIN tworkorder_da c ON c.tworkorder_fk = b.tworkorder_pk WHERE a.manifest_no IN
#[]#
ORDER BY b.tworkorder_pk ASC

as atworkorder_adhoc, atworkorder.origintlocation_fk as atworkorder_origintlocation_fk, atworkorder.destinationtlocation_fk as atworkorder_destinationtlocation_fk, atworkorder.tservicemode_fk as atworkorder_tservicemode_fk, atworkorder.torder_fk as atworkorder_torder_fk, atworkorder.tservicetype_fk as atworkorder_tservicetype_fk, atworkorder.tvendor_fk as atworkorder_tvendor_fk, atworkorder.agreementno as atworkorder_agreementno, atworkorder.pph as atworkorder_pph, atworkorder.ppn as atworkorder_ppn, atworkorder.executiondate as atworkorder_executiondate, atworkorder.editcounter as atworkorder_editcounter, atworkorder.revisioncounter as atworkorder_revisioncounter, atworkorder.lasttlevel as atworkorder_lasttlevel, getNextApp(atworkorder.tworkorder_pk) as atworkorder_nextApprovalName, atworkorder.nexttlevel as atworkorder_nexttlevel, atworkorder.createddate as atworkorder_createddate, atworkorder.createdbyemployeeid as atworkorder_createdbyemployeeid, atworkorder.wostatus as atworkorder_wostatus, atworkorder.approvalreason as atworkorder_approvalreason, atworkorder.cancelreason as atworkorder_cancelreason, atworkorder_revisionreason, atworkorder.validationnote as atworkorder_validationnote, atworkorder.revisionreasoneksternal as atworkorder_revisionreasoneksternal, tvendor.*, originlocation.locationname as orilocationname, originlocation.locationcode as orilocationcode, destinationlocation.locationname as destlocationname, destinationlocation.locationcode as destlocationcode, '' as da, '' as tworkorder_da_tworkorder_fk,'' as is_da_pod, '' as manifest_no, '' as tworkorder_manifest_tworkorder_fk, tworkorder_smodedetail.quantity, tworkorder_smodedetail.tservicemodedetail_fk, tworkorder_smodedetail.smdcharge, tworkorder_smodedetail.smdremarks, tworkorder_smodedetail.smddetailname,tworkorder_smodedetail.smdtcurrency_fk, tworkorder_smodedetail.deleted, atuser_first_name, atuser.middle_name as atuser_middle_name, atuser.last_name as atuser_last_name, atuser.grantfrom as atuser_grantfrom, atuser.grantto as atuser_grantto, atuser.bossemployeeid as atuser_bossemployeeid, atuser.email as atuser_email, atuser.area_id as atuser_area_id, atuser.division_id as atuser_division_id, atuser.department_id as atuser_department_id, atuser.station_id as atuser_station_id, atuser.job_title_id as atuser_job_title_id, atuser.level_id as atuser_level_id, atuser.isactiveuser as atuser_isactiveuser

from tworkorder atworkorder left outer join tvendor on atworkorder.tvendor_fk=tvendor.tvendor_pk left outer join tlocation originlocation on atworkorder.origintlocation_fk=originlocation.tlocation_pk left outer join tlocation destinationlocation on atworkorder.destinationtlocation_fk=destinationlocation.tlocation_pk left outer join tcurrency on atworkorder.tcurrency_fk=tcurrency.tcurrency_pk left outer join tuser atuser on atworkorder.createdbyemployeeid=atuser.employee_id left outer join tworkorder_smodedetail on atworkorder.tworkorder_pk=tworkorder_smodedetail.tworkorder_fk left outer join tservicemodedetail on tworkorder_smodedetail.tservicemodedetail_fk=tservicemodedetail.tservicemodedetail_pk left outer join tdeliveryterm on atworkorder.tdeliveryterm_fk=tdeliveryterm.tdeliveryterm_pk left outer join tlevel on atworkorder.maxlevel = tlevel.level_value left outer join tcurrency atcurrency on tworkorder_smodedetail.smdtcurrency_fk=atcurrency.tcurrency_pk left outer join torder on atworkorder.torder_fk=torder.torder_pk left outer join tservicetype on atworkorder.tservicetype_fk=tservicetype.tservicetype_pk
